channel.title: Congratulations Scape-JAVA
channel.description: Congrats Mr.Java xD(New mod for them who don't know this...)

item.title: Congratulations Scape-JAVA
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

Alright my 15 minutes of fame are over :p.

Read full topic

item.title: Congratulations Scape-JAVA
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

[quote=“casey., post:71, topic:364826”][quote author=SilentCJ link=topic=461032.msg3373442#msg3373442 date=1287421264]
No, casey was a naughty boy, end of discussion.
[/quote]
Just to set the story straight, I requested a demod in October, 2008 due to not having enough time to fulfill my duties. I see no point in having a moderator position if you can’t do your actions, and since I was very time consumed with school at the time, I requested the demod.

I was banned on December 31, 2008. All I had was my CM/VET and no moderator. I was banned due to the phish link I posted. It was probably the stupidest choices that I’ve made, but I needed some cash to pay someone back. I only got like two accounts, but I never changed the passwords in the end because I’m not that mean of a person. Of course, the consequences sucked and I lost my community member, vet, and awards, but is what it is.

No I was thinking someone more like casey tbh.

From what I’ve heard, I will never have the ability to receive any form of power again. Obviously I have fought this hard over the past year or so, but like I said, it is what it is. I can’t change my choice and have to accept the results. I guess the staff just don’t feel like people can change

Though obviously I care very much about this site, even though I might get a bit trolly at times, it’s all in good fun. In my view, a moderator is a role-model to the community(as is any form of title[cm/vet]) and I’ve always said you all need to work better as a team. Don’t let Scape do all of the work, he shouldn’t be just thrown in and having to do all of the reports. Teach him right so he can learn how to moderate properly, and help future staff members.

So now you guys can stop saying I was “demoted” or a “terrible mod”[/quote]

Aaah, never was told about the resigning, I just knew about the phishing, thanks for clearing that up though.

Read full topic

item.title: Congratulations Scape-JAVA
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

SilentCJ:

No, casey was a naughty boy, end of discussion.

Just to set the story straight, I requested a demod in October, 2008 due to not having enough time to fulfill my duties. I see no point in having a moderator position if you can’t do your actions, and since I was very time consumed with school at the time, I requested the demod.

I was banned on December 31, 2008. All I had was my CM/VET and no moderator. I was banned due to the phish link I posted. It was probably the stupidest choices that I’ve made, but I needed some cash to pay someone back. I only got like two accounts, but I never changed the passwords in the end because I’m not that mean of a person. Of course, the consequences sucked and I lost my community member, vet, and awards, but is what it is.

krackkid:

No I was thinking someone more like casey tbh.

From what I’ve heard, I will never have the ability to receive any form of power again. Obviously I have fought this hard over the past year or so, but like I said, it is what it is. I can’t change my choice and have to accept the results. I guess the staff just don’t feel like people can change

In my view, a moderator is a role-model to the community(as is any form of title[cm/vet]) and I’ve always said you all need to work better as a team. Don’t let Scape do all of the work, he shouldn’t be just thrown in and having to do all of the reports. Teach him right so he can learn how to moderate properly, and help future staff members.

Obviously a care about this site, maybe too much as explained why this long post lol.

So now you guys can stop saying I was “demoted” or a “terrible mod”

Read full topic

At least we know he is going to be committed while being promoted.
[/quote]No offense to Adam of course (because he’s pretty cool), but all mods go on an activity spree right when they’re promoted.

Well, for the time being then ;), although I am usually consistent.

yes, im going to try and say what cj said, but in a drug person’s view, kind of
in this saying

if you smoke weed to much(lock to many topics, ect), you will soon die(resign), but if you smoke little by little and share, then you will last longer[/quote]

Are you on heroin?
